children.name: isMilestone
Example - check whether the task is a milestone

children.description: Checks whether the event has zero duration.

children.name: duration
Example - get length of the task

children.description: Returns the gantt task length in milliseconds.

children.name: GanttTask.define

parameters.name: options.fields.fieldName.validation `Object`
parameters.description: Specifies the validation options which will be used by [Kendo Validator](/api/framework/validator).

parameters.name: options.fields.fieldName.type `String`
parameters.description: Specifies the the type of the field. The available options are `"string"`, `"number"`, `"boolean"`, `"date`". The default is `"string"`.

parameters.name: options.fields.fieldName.parse `Function`
parameters.description: Specifies the function which will parse the field value. If not set default parsers will be used.

parameters.name: options.fields.fieldName.nullable `Boolean`
parameters.description: Specifies if the `defaultValue` setting should be used. The default is `false`.

parameters.name: options.fields.fieldName.editable `Boolean`
parameters.description: Specifies if the field is editable or not. The default value is `true`.

parameters.name: options.fields.fieldName.defaultValue
parameters.description: Specifies the which will be used for the field when a new model instance is created. Default settings depend on the type of the field. Default for "string" is `""`,for "number" is `0` and for "date" is `new Date()` (today).

parameters.name: options.fields `Object`
parameters.description: A set of key/value pairs the configure the model fields. The key specifies the name of the field.Quote the key if it contains spaces or other symbols which are not valid for a JavaScript identifier.

parameters.name: options.id `String`
parameters.description: The name of the field which acts as an identifier of the gantt task.The identifier is used to determine if a model instance is new or existing one.If the value of the field specified is equal to the default value (specified through the `fields` configuration) the model is considered as new.

parameters.name: options `Object`
parameters.description: Describes the configuration options of the new gantt task class.

children.description: Defines a new `GanttTask` type using the provided options.

children.name: Example - get the title of a task
Example - get the task summary field
Example - get the start date of a task
Example - get the task percentComplete field
Example - get the task parentId field
Example - get the task orderId field
Example - get the task expanded field
Example - get the end date of a task
title
Example - set the title of a task

children.description: The title of the task which is displayed by the gantt widget.

children.name: summary
children.description: If set to `true` the task has child tasks.

children.name: start
Example - set the start date of a task

children.description: The date at which the gantt task starts. The `start` date is mandatory.

children.name: percentComplete
Example - set the percentComplete of a task

children.description: The percentage of completion of the task. A value between 0 and 1, representing how much of a task is completed.

children.name: parentId
children.description: The 'id' of the parent task. Required for child tasks.

children.name: orderId
Example - set the orderId of a task

children.description: The position of the task relative to its sibling tasks.

children.name: id
Example - set the identifier of a task

children.description: The mandatory unique identifier of the task.

children.name: expanded
children.description: If set to `true` the task is expanded and it's child tasks are visible.

children.name: end
Example - set the end date of a task

children.description: The date at which the gantt task ends. The `end` date is mandatory.
